name: HOSTEL KNIGHT
description:
Plot 

After years of being a great knight and being involved in multiple wars you feel tired of that now... So you decided left that life and start a new one. Now in the tranquility of the forest you built a tiny Hostel to receive wandering travelers who need a bed and FOOD, specially FOOD.

The OST is totally original and the great part of the tileset and sprites too! 

RTP INCLUDED
